channel.title: Engineering in the wild
channel.description: Recent content on Engineering in the wild

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello dear friend! Welcome to my new blog. I am 28 year old software developer (Golang developer) from Kazakhstan. Here I will post my updates on Go, Competative Programming, Security, and other interesting IT things that I will explore on my engineering path.
item.content: Hello dear friend! Welcome to my new blog. I am 28 year old software developer (Golang developer) from Kazakhstan. Here I will post my updates on Go, Competative Programming, Security, and other interesting IT things that I will explore on my engineering path.
